__comment_texture: The texture for the skybox, by identifier name (directory path after assets/minecraft/)
__comment_startFadeIn: The time that your skybox will begin fading in, in ticks (0-24000)
__comment_endFadeIn: The time that your skybox will finish fading in, in ticks (0-24000)
__comment_startFadeOut: This value isn't visible, is calculated by the endFadeOut value - the duration of fading in.
__comment_endFadeOut: The time that your skybox finishes fading out, in ticks (0-24000)
__comment_transition: The amount of time that it takes for a skybox to fade in/out, in seconds.
__comment_blend: The blending mode to use.  (Not currently fully implemented) Optional.  Default add
__comment_rotate: Whether your skybox should rotate.  Optional.  Default true
__comment_speed: The speed that your skybox rotates.  Required if rotate equals true.
__comment_axis: The axis that your skybox should rotate on.  Required if rotate equals true.
__comment_weather: The weather to show skyboxes in.  Possible values: clear, rain, thunder.  Optional. May be a singular string or a array, if specifying multiple.
__comment_biomes: The biome(s) to show the skybox in.  Uses biome identifiers (for example: minecraft:plains).  Optional.  May be a singular string or a array, if specifying multiple.
__comment_dimensions: The dimension(s) to show the skybox in.  Uses dimension identifiers (for example: minecraft:overworld).  Optional.  May be a singular string or a array, if specifying multiple.
__comment_heights: The height range(s) to show the skybox in.  Optional.
